programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun take a risk in revealing the secret of the Hidden Realm to D’Angelo to aid an injured dragon, and D’Angelo bonds with Plowhorn.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesn’t want the others to hear what’s in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement can’t happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It's Ball-entine’s Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe he’s a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesn’t go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis’ backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ian’s lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean Luc-Picard and the crew of the newly commissioned Enterprise E battle the insidious Borg to restore the rightful future of Earth.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: Doom: Annihilation
programme.desc: Based on the popular original video game, Doom: Annihilation is an explosive, terrifying thrill ride.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Welcome To Sudden Death

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Jowable
programme.desc: Jowable follows the story of Elsa (Kim Molina), no boyfriend since birth as she embarks on finding her one true love. It becomes a question whether an actual future jowa is out there waiting for her.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Fantastica
programme.desc: The proprietor of a struggling carnival must help a prince from another land find three lost princesses.

programme.title: Banyo Queen
programme.desc: Angelie (Rica Peralejo) comes from a family of sorceress. As a tradition, everyone should have a virgin sacrifice before their 18th birthday to escape the curse. With the help of her Aunt Chada (Mystica), she hunts a virgin to stay alive.

programme.title: Squad Goals
programme.desc: Five boys finds connection in each other while dealing with school, love and family problems.

programme.title: Revirginized
programme.desc: Carmela (Sharon Cuneta) gets to enjoy life again in a wild beach party. With young people and a hunk tattoo artist, she drowns herself in alcohol to forget her current self and renew her old self.

programme.title: Para Sa Broken Hearted
programme.desc: Three interweaving stories of broken hearts, that tackle the pain of heartbreak, acceptance, moving on and the courage to learn to love again.

programme.title: Gluta
programme.desc: An Aeta dreams of winning the Miss University pageant but faces discrimination from people - including her own uncle who does not believe that people like them are beautiful.

programme.title: Basta Ikaw... Nanginginig Pa
programme.desc: Enteng (Vic Sotto) has long been looking for the right girl, it seems that he doesn’t have much luck at it. Disappointed, he decides to join his cousin in Manila where he meets Selya (Rosanna Roces), his cousin’s landlady.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A prolific killer-for-hire finds solace and redemption after rescuing a teenage girl who was held captive by the man she was paid to kill.

programme.title: Double Barrel
programme.desc: A young impoverished couple work as hired killers.

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel (Joem Bascon) and Cynthia (Mercedes Cabral), a young couple with a child on the way, head back to Baguio to start over again. Everything seems to be falling into place for them - or so they think - until strange things start to happen in their house.

programme.title: Ikaw Pa Rin, Bongga Ka Boy!
programme.desc: Baby is a veterinarian who bumps into a heroic fireman named Boy. Will this lead to a more serious relationship between the two people or will they continue to be unlucky in love?

programme.title: When The Love Is Gone
programme.desc: The movie is a remake of the 1983 blockbuster movie directed by Danny Zialcita entitled Nagalit ang Buwan sa Haba ng Gabi. A gripping, moving story of love lost, love gained, love betrayed, and love unbound.

programme.title: Cheers S4 E07 - 2 Good To Be 4 Reel
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E03 - Murder Is Easy (Part 1)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E04 - Murder Is Easy (Part 2)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: A Kiss Before Christmas
programme.desc: Ethan, always the nice guy, wakes up in a new reality at Christmas. Initially, he is enthralled with his new life but soon realizes that it's not what he thought it would be.

programme.title: North And South Book I E01 - Episode 1 (Part 1)
programme.desc: 1842. Two West Point military academy cadets form a bond of friendship strong enough to survive the forces leading to the United States' Civil War--forces that will rip their country into North and South

programme.title: Cheers S4 E08 - Love Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: The regulars of the Boston bar "Cheers" share their experiences and lives with each other while drinking or working at the bar where everybody knows your name.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E05 - They Do It With Mirrors (Part 1)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple S4 E06 - They Do It With Mirrors (Part 2)
programme.desc: Julia McKenzie perfectly captures Agatha Christie’s iconic amateur detective - and the innocent exterior which harbours a razor- sharp mind.

programme.title: CSI S4 E12 - Butterflied
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: ALF S2 E01 - Working My Way Back to You
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E22 - The Life of the Party
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.title: The Waltons S2 E05 - The Roots
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: ALF S2 E02 - Ballad of Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Lacking in manners but blessed with a big heart, the brash and outspoken ALF thrills and delights the Tanner family. But Mrs. Tanner worries about the example he sets for the kids.

programme.title: Frasier S5 E23 - Party Party
programme.desc: This season of FRASIER finds Niles and Frasier competing again, this time over who will find their father Martin the better birthday gift. Meanwhile, Daphne finds her favorite pub invaded by a familiar and unwelcome interloper.

programme.desc: The Center for the Study of Extra-Terrestrial Intelligence defines a "Close Encounter of The Fifth Kind" as direct human contact and communication with extraterrestrial life.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: As the team performs a massive, multi-focused experiment, they complete an operation that may reveal the ultimate answers on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: The legendary treasures of the Copper Scroll, King Solomon's mines, and the Syamantaka Gem have captivated the world for centuries. But could these vast fortunes still be out there, waiting to be found?

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: From the ancient Babylonians to modern day urban explorers, mankind has always been fascinated by abandoned places. What is the allure that draws us to these post-apocalyptic landscapes?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: As the Fellowship prepares to get a team member underground in the Money Pit for the first time, a new theory emerges suggesting that Nolan's Cross holds the secret to its exact location.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Racing an incoming hurricane, Darrell Miklos and his team are forced to make tough choices. But after a season-long search, they locate the source of the massive magnetometer hit recorded at Target 4.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5)
programme.desc: As the team performs a massive, multi-focused experiment, they complete an operation that may reveal the ultimate answers on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S14)

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Batang Lansangan
programme.desc: Simple as his dreams would be, Ronnie Ricketts is a typical auto mechanic who wants only a peaceful and plain life. But no matter how he tried to live the life he desires, still the rotten elements of the society keep running after him.

programme.title: Lucas Abelardo
programme.desc: His sincerity and great dedication to his work is what distinguished police officer Lucas Abelardo from his other colleagues. But keeping to his principles while doing his job is not easy.

programme.title: Love at First Sight
programme.desc: Three childhood friends discover their worth and inner strengths, as they experience love and being loved.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as "bad boy" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Pinagbiyak Na Bunga (Lookalayk)
programme.desc: Watching Andrew E and Chiquito together as they play the parts of con-men who might indeed be father and son.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Love triangles will always be with us as long as romantic melodramas are made for the screen. The latest trio are Sharon Cuneta, Richard Gomez and TonTon Gutierrez. Sharon plays Irene, the wife torn between two men.

programme.title: Regalo
programme.desc: Tragedy had struck newlyweds, Daniel Fernando and Sheila Ysrael, when Daniel was paralyzed. Sheila was soon seduced by Dan Fernadez, a household help.

programme.title: Itanong Mo Sa Buwan
programme.desc: Josie is not really a victim but Angelito's lover. He then declares they planned the whole thing to finance a new life together. Who is telling the truth?

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig ng Puso? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.desc: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 6
programme.desc: Minds are blown when two of our buyers team up for a major score. It's an unlikely pair that, together, could make a pile of cash. Plus, Jesse takes a big gamble on some African art and sweats it out hard when the authenticity is questioned. And later, the day's final auction reveals contents so shocking our buyers may be shut out of this game completely.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war. One of them spies an authentic treasure hidden amongst the contents, but only one will walk away with the score. And later, a newbie steals a prize unit out from under our regulars and proves that she's here to play. Then, Brandon and Lori unearth a five-alarm find. If it works, they could be looking at a $20,000 pay day on this item alone.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they determine which hacks work best for combatting spicy foods, peeling potatoes, and keeping the mirror from fogging up after a shower. Plus, they'll reveal the best camping hacks, and see if a fork made from a pencil really does the trick.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 3
programme.desc: The guys must identify the Joker behind the humiliating commands in a voice disguising challenge. Then they call it quits with a cringe-worthy public announcement, and act as dinosaur experts with preposterous prehistoric lessons.

programme.desc: In the wake of learning that Bruno and Peia are married, Clark works to reignite Lois’ interest in taking Bruno down.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 8
programme.desc: Our buyers bid big to win a locker packed with what looks like rare art, but will the winner walk away with cash or counterfeits? Then, a dumpy unit sends almost everyone running, but Papa Bear spies a profit. And later, the day's final auction contains expensive looking sky-diving equipment that ignites a sky-high bidding war. But when the dust settles, the winner will unveil a hidden gem that spells a five-figure payday.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 9
programme.desc: Our buyers go head-to-head to score an item that appears to be a covered car. But when the tarp is pulled back, will the winner drive away with a pile of cash or a piece of trash? Then, the legality of a locker's contents is called into question, but Brandon and Lori take a leap of faith and are rattled by what they find. And later, Sean has saved the best for last as our buyers are given the rare opportunity to compete for unclaimed airline luggage. It's an auction of a different breed that ignites a cash spending frenzy.

programme.title: East New York S1 11
programme.desc: Killian and Morales investigate the mysterious death of a dancer found on the New York City subway tracks.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S3 9
programme.desc: Superman and John Henry clash over how to handle Bruno Mannheim, while Lois worries over upcoming treatments and confides in Lana about her early courtship with Clark.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 03
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin test a variety of hacks to find out which work best for shining your shoes, avoiding a soda can explosion, and putting wine in a blender. Plus, they'll find the most efficient hacks for home maintenance, and teach you which hacks will help combat any party animal.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 4
programme.desc: The Impractical Jokers, Sal, Joe, Murr and Q meet after the show to talk about their favorite moments during the show not to mention the most uncomfortable, most embarrassing, most humiliating and most outrageous. It is a chance for the viewers to hear about all the behind the scenes mishaps and awkward scenes as well as see outtakes never seen before.

programme.title: Baby Morphles!
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesn't know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: ARPO Has a Crazy Day
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moment’s notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Danny’s curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

The presenters review these press headlines and offer details about the stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 111
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 15
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Brilliant Brunch
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, and Adam hosts a brilliant brunch with his brilliant guests, comedian Nina Oyama and chef Matt Stone.

programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Sitting in the hot seat is new host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - Operation Legacy
programme.desc: From the bustling streets of Nairobi to a secluded royal retreat in the Kenyan mountains, Marc Fennell is on the hunt for secret documents that reveal a brutal history of war and a crumbling empire.

programme.title: Dream Gardens - Erskineville, NSW
programme.desc: A couple sacrifice their honeymoon to create a rooftop oasis for their inner-city apartment. Facing strata, weight and water restrictions will they succeed in going from barren to blissful?

programme.title: Art Works - Episode 1
programme.desc: We head to three of Australia's summer arts festivals in Adelaide, Perth and Sydney, before we unpack the idea of 'art-washing': when organisations, individuals and even countries use art to distract from negative actions.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 93
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Brilliant Brunch
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, and Adam hosts a brilliant brunch with his brilliant guests, comedian Nina Oyama and chef Matt Stone.

programme.title: This Place - Bobbinawarra
programme.desc: Bobbinawarra is Bangerang for pelican, and you are almost guaranteed to see one in the lakes, ponds and rivers that surround this tiny locale. Bangerang elder uncle Freddie Dowling tells how inland pelicans came to be.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 16
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Way Out Ag - Jujube We Do!
programme.desc: Jujubes have been grown in Asia for thousands of years but are relatively new to Australia. Some inventive farmers in South Australia's Riverland are now even turning it into vinegar and beer, as Landline reported in 2020.

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: Absence Of Malice
programme.desc: An absorbing drama of the power of the press and the pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard
programme.desc: After the death of his brother, an expert street dancer goes to Georgia to attend Truth University. But his efforts to get an education and woo the girl he likes are sidelined when he joins in his fraternity's effort to win a step dancing competition.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, a high-priced and ruthless jury "consultant" will stop at nothing to secure a verdict on an explosive trial.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Absence Of Malice
programme.desc: An absorbing drama of the power of the press and the pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard
programme.desc: After the death of his brother, an expert street dancer goes to Georgia to attend Truth University. But his efforts to get an education and woo the girl he likes are sidelined when he joins in his fraternity's effort to win a step dancing competition.

programme.title: Asia First
programme.desc: (Live) Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: ROOTS: A Greening Journey
programme.desc: Singapore horticulturists search for new climate proof trees in Latin America, where years ago, the city-state's greening pioneers sourced plants that helped transform the island into a Garden City.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Love After 60
programme.desc: These lonely seniors, all over 60, are searching for love. But in conservative Indian society, they must defy taboos and face judgment—even from their own families.

programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help ‘victims’ in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Red Rain

programme.title: 3AM

When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer…

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: After Derrick Todd Lee was arrested, police were able to connect him to other cold cases. Baton Rouge had approximately 60 unsolved cases of missing or murdered women from the previous 10 years.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: Investigators trying to determine who shot and killed a young mother in Ohio are tipped off by a surprising piece of digital evidence. They unravel a twisted story of stalking and social media catfishing.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: After a woman is brutally murdered just a week before her wedding, detectives interrogate three possible suspects, including her fiancé.

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a 13-year-old girl goes missing and is found murdered, virtual evidence she leaves behind leads to two shocking arrests.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When mother of two, Deanna Cook, missed her daily call to her mom, her family began to worry Deanna's 'stalker' might be involved. After texting and calling Deanna, her family called 911.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: Romance novelist Nancy Brophy faces life in prison for the murder of her husband, Chef Dan Brophy. After finding surveillance video showing Nancy's minivan driving around the time and area of his murder.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Melissa Lucio was sentenced to death for the murder of her two-year-old daughter, Mariah, and in January 2022 she was given an official execution date of April 27, 2022.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A couple in North Carolina shares their home with a shadow figure. A werewolf stalks a man's backyard in Brazil. A store in Taiwan has a ghostly customer. Plus much more terrifying paranormal footage.

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: When an infant's body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: Police race across three states to catch a bus carrying an alleged gunman threatening to kill everyone onboard. On the coast of Florida, a toddler fights for her life after being found face down in a pool.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a mum fighting for custody of her kids tries to steal a court deputy's gun. A Sovereign Citizen hangs up during a virtual sentencing.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a murderous wife pleads for sympathy; a virtual DUI hearing goes from joking to screaming; a defendant's angry brother must be removed from the courtroom.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A man tells police he was pushed to the brink before murdering his wife; an A-list actor is questioned in a deadly on-set death; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A teen gives the chilling reason for why she killed her 9-year-old neighbour; a man turns himself in after committing a deadly mistake; an investigator uses her skills to get a killer to open up; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives believe the victim of a shooting was a Good Samaritan who'd been robbed. But at trial, the jury must decide if his killer actually acted in fear of his own life.
